ygData.subject: Re: Classic
ygData.msgSnippet: I too started just after Kunark.  I remember the run across Antonica to get from Qeynos to Freeport, out running Giants, that group in the mountains, Griffs,
ygData.messageBody:
I too started just after Kunark. I remember the run across Antonica to
get from Qeynos to Freeport, out running Giants, that group in the
mountains, Griffs, Gnolls, Orcs! That was always fun. And boat rides!

I used to hate being in EC on Sunday. Every channel was jammed with
auctions, shouts and tells! There were so many people there it was
slow and glitchy. And then there was the search to try and find the
sellr. But the deals! And I used to make a ton of plat making arrows.

As a Ranger that would mean back to the days of the SSoM, Ivy Etched
armor and Evileye bags. How quaint!

Yeah, I'd do it.

Tuldayen Grimblade
Warder of Tunare
